subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Collin Zych, a rare N.F.L. prospect from the Ivy League, has come a long way since high school, when he and his coach made pitches just to get Harvard to pay attention to him.
snippet: Collin Zych, a rare N.F.L. prospect from the Ivy League, has come a long way since high school, when he and his coach made pitches just to get Harvard to pay attention to him.
